General.Name: Chenzhou Jingui Silver Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Chenzhou City Jingui Silver Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of silver and silver deep-processed products in China. Its products include high-purity silver, silver products, high-purity silver nitrate, electrolytic lead, crude lead, etc. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Chenzhou, China.
